documents.document: So at first, Sigmund the 🐹 fired Judas the 🐍 for being lousy at analyzing the sub-conscious
So Judas the 🐍 sued Sigmund the 🐹 for damages inflicted when analyzing the sub-conscious
🐹⚖📜🆚🐍⚖📜 But Sigmund the 🐹 launched a counter suit against Judas the 🐍.
🐍😠😐✌✌😐😠🐹 (or: 🐍 settled with 🐹) So Judas the 🐍 and Sigmund the 🐹 reached a settlement deal.
So Judas the 🐍 formed a rivalry with Sigmund the 🐹 as to who was best at probing the mind
🐹😧👍🐍 (or: 🐹 was impressed by 🐍) But Judas the 🐍 made a tremendous impression on Sigmund the 🐹.
🐹⬅🖐🐍 (or: 🐍 reached out to 🐹) So Judas the 🐍 reached out to make a connection to Sigmund the 🐹.
🐍🖐🔁💵🐹 (or: 🐹 dealt with 🐍) Well, Sigmund the 🐹 reached a deal with Judas the 🐍.
🐍💬❓❓🐹🔥😨🔥 (or: 🐹 was probed by 🐍) So Judas the 🐍 probed Sigmund the 🐹 for secrets and hidden weaknesses.
🐹💬🐍 (or: 🐍 was informed by 🐹) Then Sigmund the 🐹 passed valuable information to Judas the 🐍.
After this, Judas the 🐍 profited handsomely from Sigmund the 🐹's talent for betraying friends
So Judas the 🐍 consulted with Sigmund the 🐹 as to the best way of betraying friends
Well, Sigmund the 🐹 mentored Judas the 🐍 in the ways of probing the mind
🐍👌🐹 (or: 🐍 agreed with 🐹) Then Judas the 🐍 came to agreement with Sigmund the 🐹.
So in the end Judas the 🐍 hired Sigmund the 🐹 to help him with selling out
What fate is written in the stars for Judas the 🐍 and Sigmund the 🐹? The End
#MichaelJFox combines the best of #JonathanSwift and the worst of #FrodoBaggins: humorous and witty yet also short and vertically-challenged
Most semiconductors are advanced, but others are as 'advanced' as five year olds
#Irony is when you 🌕. Invent a scam 💒. Marry a wild scamster nicknamed "the dingo" 🌗. Tell wild lies 💩. Get dumped for acting like a heathen https://t.co/He1sOUdnF6
Most bakers are traditional, but others are as 'traditional' as a brain surgeon making house calls
Screwball. noun. A peculiar union of 5 parts mistake-making klutz to 4 parts wit-losing wackjob. #Screwball=#Wackjob #Screwball=#Klutz
So I'm not the most effervescent beer in the barrel. More like the flattest biscuit in a barrel full of flat biscuits. #Beer=#Biscuit
Helpful detectives like Miss Jane Marple put me in mind of teammates: they're as helpful as a demonstration by an accomplished skier
Panelist. noun. A coward who would rather demonstrate insufficient qualifications than insufficient inadequacy. #Panelist=#Coward
Most lattices are consistent, but others are as 'consistent' as the weather in the Maritimes
This visual metaphor is for @e-t-i-e-n-n-e on https://t.co/MId1pkLkp8, thanks for the colours! It's titled "Old Cheeze Burger." #VisMetRGB https://t.co/AOPuBOxseA
🐹😄😏👉🐍 But Sigmund the 🐹 looked down on Judas the 🐍 from a height Sigmund the 🐹 considered Judas the 🐍 to be its social inferior.
Have you heard about the jokester who embraced perfidy, became a scammer and went from inventing spontaneous gags to inventing staged scams?
Most sluts are raunchy, but others are as 'raunchy' as a bag of icing sugar
Last night I dreamt I was extracting confessions with #TomásDeTorquemada when we were coshed with a tyre iron by #RalphNader #Caring=#Cruel
I guess #RalphNader and #TomásDeTorquemada represent warring parts of my personality: the caring vs. cruel sides. #Caring=#Cruel
Most pharisees are pious, but others are as 'pious' as Bacchus
🌕. Enroll in an academy 🌖. Become a pupil 🌗. Study the "Academy of Music" 🌘. Become a composer 🌑. Be expelled from the academy https://t.co/vPJ8cho9A4
Most buildings are tall, but others are as 'tall' as a baby
I learn so much from similes on the Web E.g., "About as unexpected as finding fur on a cat" That one's #ironic, I think. #I_Collect_Similes
🌕. Set out to become an artistic musician 🌖. Join a band 🌗. Realize you've joined a band of crass rednecks 🌘. So move to a trailer park
Pathetic drunks like Barney Gumble put me in mind of phonies: they're as pathetic as Don Quixote tilting at windmills
I learn a lot about the world from the questions people ask Google E.g., "Why does the sun rise in the east?" #ShitThatHumansSay
Rugged spies like James Bond put me in mind of trucks: they're as rugged as a bank vault
Mentor. noun. A sensible pairing of 1 part lesson-delivering tutor to 1 part advice-giving consultant. #Mentor=#Consultant #Mentor=#Tutor
This visual metaphor is for @kirei on https://t.co/MId1pkLkp8, thanks for the colours! It's titled "C L A S H." #VisMetRGB https://t.co/HUiKIeQtGk
Impressive businessmen like P. T. Barnum put me in mind of kings: they're as impressive as Bugs Bunny
#Irony: When the venoms that are produced by sharp wasps are produced by the fuzziest bees. #Sharp=#Fuzzy #Venom
Unlucky curmudgeons like Victor Meldrew put me in mind of freaks: they're as unlucky as getting hit by a meteor
@puzzlepoesis Most cures are wonderful, but others are as 'wonderful' as poison ivy to a leper colony
"Hulk hate humans that are sent on a mission and tweet about their masks. Hulk smash puny commandos and their masks!" #ThingsHulkNeverSaid
Weatherman. noun. An actuary who would rather make calculated predictions than calculated calculations. #Weatherman=#Actuary
Unflappable actors like Bill Murray put me in mind of sphinxes: they're as unflappable as a concrete bollard
I painted this picture of #TimBurton's innermost soul using inventive Wonka-purple, witty Dante-inferno-red and dark grime-brown. https://t.co/7OrsA4AGDK
Culpable politicians like Neville Chamberlain put me in mind of masterminds: they're as culpable as a hit man
@puzzlepoesis To mention speakers in your tweet indicates that you are demanding to be heard.
A smuggler asks: "Last night I dreamt I was a vacationer, sleeping in a hotel. What could this mean?" #Welcoming=#Forbidding
Hotels are welcoming while caves are usually forbidding. You wish that sleeping in a cave was more like sleeping in a hotel.
Killing. noun. Collective term for a group of corrupt mobsters and less-than-pure infants. #Infant=#Mobster
Stubborn heroes like Sam Winchester put me in mind of pigs: they're as stubborn as a pit bull with the nose of a bloodhound
Reputable scholars are like doctors when they apply the knowledge of medicine. #Scholar=#Doctor
Disreputable scholars are more like cheats, for theirs is the knowledge of cheating. #Scholar=#Cheat #Scholar=#Doctor
Affectionate chefs like Monica Geller put me in mind of friends: they're as affectionate as a dog
Fraud practices deceptions. Innovators inspire the imitators that practice deceptions. Do innovators make good frauds? #Innovator=#Fraud
@puzzlepoesis Fascinating geniuses like Stephen Hawking put me in mind of journeys: they're as fascinating as seeing fire for the first time
#Irony: When some waiters are hired by "chic" bistros the way cashiers are hired by gaudy casinos. #Waiter=#Cashier #Bistro=#Casino
Most relics are uncommon, but others are as 'uncommon' as the sunrise
#Irony: When obedient soldiers dash like the most impudent villains. #Obedient=#Impudent #Soldier=#Villain
Dangerous mathematicians like Professor James Moriarty put me in mind of pythons: they're as dangerous as a rabid rattlesnake
I call this picture "Pearl". I painted it with polished ruby-red, cute mouse-grey and flashy Bollywood-curry-brown. #PearlRGB https://t.co/jJonsuACI4
You don't have to be conquering to be a crusader, nor nonviolent to be a hippy. There's Zen in Venn #YenForVenn https://t.co/lZkCIzRKWx
Warm chefs like Nigella Lawson put me in mind of lovers: they're as warm as a warm spring day
I used to think of myself as a great star targeted by satirists. Now I see myself as a worthless loser that bounced back from defeat.
Dynamic athletes like John McEnroe put me in mind of daredevils: they're as dynamic as the weather
🌞. Set out to become a devout disciple 🌤. Join a cult 🌬. Realize you've joined a cult of irreligious heretics 🌩. So break with orthodoxy
Most frauds are immoral, but others are as 'immoral' as a lion eating a buffalo
#Abuse is when you: 🤔. Are hired by a television station 😏. Become a broadcaster 😥. Engage in abusive communications 😣. Turn into a bully https://t.co/HRIBsB85eM
I call this picture "Slut". I painted it with sensual lingerie-black, promiscuous Casanova-oyster-white and naughty vixen-red. #SlutRGB https://t.co/OBm85DrDiU
Most frauds are inaccurate, but others are as 'inaccurate' as Encyclopedia Britannica
.@war_goddess says politics is a blessed religion .@war_combatant says it is an unfortunate war #Politics=#Religion #Politics=#War
Rude pundits like Christopher Hitchens put me in mind of bitches: they're as rude as someone bringing bags of Burger King to a wedding reception
A tyrant calling himself @war_national writes "Last night I dreamt I was a supportive loyalist favored by a government." #Tyrant=#Loyalist
In your dream GOVERNMENT = VICTIMS, @war_national. Victims are typically oppressed by oppressive tyrants. Are you supportive or oppressive?
@epiktistes To taste something sweet in your tweet suggests that life is going well for you.
@epiktistes To mention a robot in your tweet indicates that you are going about life in a mechanical, methodical and rigid way.
🚪. Be hired by a family 👋. Become a nanny 💒. Marry a user 💞. Install an application 💔. Be hired by a "family of applications" https://t.co/hxdL9hvBht
Disgusting actors like John Belushi put me in mind of pariahs: they're as disgusting as an ass rash
Last night I dreamt I was a comedienne, telling a joke. What does this mean? #Joke
Well, to dream that you are telling a joke denotes that you are not being taken seriously and as a result you are feeling frustrated. #Joke
Terse heroines like Trinity put me in mind of growls: they're as terse as a blurb
What if #SilenceOfTheLambs were real? #RaymondChandler could be its #HannibalLecter: insightful and urbane, yet alcoholic too
🌞. Campaign for congress 🌤. Impose the "control of congress" 🌬. Act like a controller, not a senator 🌩. Lose control 🌂. Retire from congress https://t.co/egsIoil6kx
Skilled sportsmen like Kobe Bryant put me in mind of sculptors like Michelangelo: they're as skilled as a knight
You can work in the dirtiest professions and still call yourself a respected professional. #Profession=#Brothel #Professional=#Prostitute
But work in even one brothel and people dismiss you as an immoral prostitute. #Profession=#Brothel #Professional=#Prostitute
Most strangers are unassuming, but others are as 'unassuming' as a tsunami earthquake combination
"Listen, it is better to be a runaway seeking a calm sanctuary than an entrepreneur seeking an anxious investor." #ThingsTrumpNeverSaid
Blessed are the assertive aggressors that are defeated in the war, for they shall find mentors and become tentative beginners #GospelOfVenn https://t.co/iar076Ivq3
Most paintings are visual, but others are as 'visual' as an audio book
🌞. Be elevated to the bench 🌤. Become a liberal jurist 🌬. Embrace liberality as a liberal 🌩. Retire from the bench 🌂. Renounce liberality https://t.co/8xTTr0jNJy
Most savages are daring, but others are as 'daring' as Mickey Mouse
#Irony: When the hosts that plan the most fawning parties are also exploited by the most reigning parasites. #Fawning=#Reigning
🕘. Recruit workers 🕛. Become a corrupt hirer 🕑. Succumb to corruption as a sinner 🕞. Fire all your workers 🕔. Renounce corruption https://t.co/719kRVI9Wu
Fiery cowboys like Yosemite Sam put me in mind of ovens: they're as fiery as a vibrant crimson
